entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:31 a.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -1.4Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
